about_the_game:
Original soundtrack of Swaps and Traps contains 13 grooves to keep you rockin', rollin', and head-bangin'!

01 - Main Theme [0:20]
02 - Curious Mike [2:09]
03 - I Feel Like Jumping [1:02]
04 - Jungle Groove [1:00]
05 - This Rocks! [1:21]
06 - I'm not Afraid [1:28]
07 - Howling Dance [1:28]
08 - Beats Me [1:28]
09 - Oms and Drums [1:21]
10 - I Don't Like Caves [1:30]
11 - Take a Breath [1:40]
12 - Flipping Swaps [1:07]
13 - We Meet Again [1:21]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 98 / XP / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10, 32 bit
  • Processor: 500 MHz or faster
  • Memory: 256 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card that can run Microsoft® Windows®
  • Storage: 22 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card that can play mp3 files.
